actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Labor Management Relations Act, 1947, to permit employee contributions to jointly administered trust funds established by Labor organizations to defray costs of legal services.

summary.text: Permits employee contributions, under the Labor Management Relations Act, to jointly administered trust funds established by labor organizations to defray costs of legal services. (Amends 29 U.S.C. 186)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Labor Management Relations Act, 1947, to permit employee contributions to jointly administered trust funds established by Labor organizations to defray costs of legal services.
